com.samsung.android.sdk.cup

Class ScupGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.cup.ScupWidgetBase
      • com.samsung.android.sdk.cup.ScupGraph

  • public class ScupGraph
extends ScupWidgetBase
    This class represents a graph widget.
    This is a kind of extended widget. If a device can not support this widget, a device can display using base widget instead of this.

    • Method Detail

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Destroys a ScupGraph instance.
        If the Graph is shown on the screen, graph should be hidden automatically.
        Overrides:
        destroy in class ScupWidgetBase
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If widget is already destroyed.

      • setStyle

        public void setStyle(int style)
        Sets the style of graph. bar graph
        Parameters:
        style - the graph style.
        It is one of STYLE_LINE or STYLE_BAR.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If style is invalid.

      • hideYAxis

      • setYAxis

        public void setYAxis(int min,
            int max,
            int step)
        Sets the minimum/maximum value and step of graph
        Parameters:
        min - The minimum value
        max - The maximum value
        step - The horizontal line is drawn each step value. NOT SUPPORTED YET.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If min is greater than or equal to max or min, max is out of pre-exist data range. If step is zero or negative. Or step is greater than Y axis absolute range value.

      • setPointImage

        public void setPointImage(int resId)
        Sets the point image in line graph style. This API set the image of each apex in line type graph.(Ex dot image.)
        The default is none.
        Parameters:
        resId - The progress image
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If resId is invalid.

      • setPointImage

        public void setPointImage(Bitmap bitmap)
        Sets the point image in line graph style.
        This API set the image of each apex in line type graph.(Ex dot image.)
        The default is none.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - point bitmap. If bitmap is null, point image will be disappeared.

      • addData

        public void addData(int id,
           int value,
           int color,
           String xAxisText,
           String valueText)
        Add data of graph
        Parameters:
        id - The id of data
        value - The value of data
        color - The color to draw line of bar
        xAxisText - The text to draw under x axis
        valueText - The text to draw near data point
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If id parameter is duplicated or invalid. Or value parameter is out of range.
        See Also:
        setYAxis(int, int, int)

      • setData

        public void setData(int id,
           int value,
           int color,
           String xAxisText,
           String valueText)
        Set data of graph
        Parameters:
        id - The id of data to change
        value - The value of data
        color - The color to draw line of bar
        xAxisText - The text to draw under x axis
        valueText - The text to draw near data point
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If id is invalid. Or value parameter is out of range.
        See Also:
        setYAxis(int, int, int)

        public void setPadding(float left,
              float top,
              float right,
              float bottom)
        Sets the padding.
        Parameters:
        left - the left padding in point units
        top - the top padding in point units
        right - the right padding in point units
        bottom - the bottom padding in point units
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If left, top, right or #bottom is negative.
